title: Four Amigos Now Wow - Look Again
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Four Amigos Now Wow - Look Again
posts.post_content:
1.  Harry Steinfeldt         Portrait       SGC 30        $32 shipped
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10317/steinfeldt-portrait[/IMG]

2.  Bob Rhoades Hands at Chest BVG 4 Piedmont reverse  $48 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10188/rhoades-ready-to-pitch[/IMG]

3.  Wilbur Goode SC 150 Fact 649 SGC 50  $68 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/14496/goode-649[/IMG]

4.  Frank Smith     F Smith on front version      BVG 3.5          $58 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10207/smith-f[/IMG]

All funds net.
Make a goode offer and these cards will be on the roads again.
Doyle has been added.  Nice card Frank.

I'm back.

Two lovely cards added that are under graded perhaps.  Perhaps not.
